.. _basic_usage:

Basic Usage
===========

Uploading a single sequncing run
--------------------------------

Click the "Choose directory" button.

.. image:: _static/basic_usage/Step1.png

Select the directory containing the SampleSheet.csv file.

.. image:: _static/basic_usage/Step2.png

If the SampleSheet.csv in the directory you selected is valid then the upload button will be displayed.  
If you see an error then see :ref:`handling_errors` for more information. 

.. image:: _static/basic_usage/Step3.png

Click the upload button to start uploading.

.. image:: _static/basic_usage/Step4.png

The upload should start in a few seconds depending on your internet speed and provide you with an estimated time until it completes.

.. image:: _static/basic_usage/Step5.gif
